title: Strengthening Software Development Practice Competencies: Conceptual Change Assessment Simulation: Science Concept Restructuring Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concept comprehension and application experience in office settings
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze everyday scientific phenomena presented in VR simulations, challenge existing concepts, and generate three or more alternative explanatory models
Learners can recognize cognitive conflicts arising during conceptual change and apply two or more metacognitive strategies to resolve them, thereby reconstructing conceptual frameworks
Learners can self-assess their conceptual change levels on a 5-point scale by analyzing concept application patterns in simulation-based assessment tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
